name: Time & Space Shenanigans
description:
This is my submission for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2020 game jam.

For the theme 'Out of control' I went with the idea of having the game record the player as they passed through the level without any hazards. Once the end of the level was reached, the recording would play back all the players actions with the hazards reintroduced.

Unfortunately I ran to a few complications and due to time constraints there is still a lot left unfinished, but hopefully the core concept is still somewhat evident while playing.  

Controls:

A, D: Movement

W, Enter: Jump

Left Click, Space bar: Shoot
